item.description: require 'softlayer_api' require 'pp' # Credentials to the API are read from a configuration file by default. # See https://github.com/softlayer/softlayer-ruby/blob/master/lib/softlayer/Config.rb#L11-L44 client = SoftLayer::Client.new(:timeout => 120) object_id = nil orderTemplate = { 'accountId' => xxxxx, 'bandwidthAllotmentTypeId' => 2, 'locationGroupId' => 1, 'name' => 'newRubyBwPool' } orderPool = client['SoftLayer_Network_Bandwidth_Version1_Allotment'] item = orderPool.object_with_id(object_id).createObject(orderTemplate) pp item
